remarks: Variant of Zorn's lemma ~ zorn in which ` (/) ` , the union of the empty chain, is not required to be an element of ` A ` .  (Contributed by Jeff Madsen, 5-Jan-2011.)
statement:
zornn0.1 $e |- A e. _V $.
zornn0 $p |- ( ( A =/= (/) /\ A. z ( ( z C_ A /\ z =/= (/) /\ [C.] Or z ) -> U. z e. A ) ) -> E. x e. A A. y e. A -. x C. y ) $.
$d A x y z $.
